mapper.insert: insert into sf_study ( study_no, study_title, study_content, loc_no, field_no, study_level, study_headCount, study_inputdate, study_hit, auth_userid, due_time, penalty_min, penalty_money, limit_time ) values ( sf_study_seq.nextval, #{study_title}, #{study_content}, #{loc_no}, #{field_no}, #{study_level}, #{study_headCount}, sysdate, 0, #{auth_userid}, #{due_time}, #{penalty_min}, #{penalty_money}, #{limit_time} )
mapper.select: select * from sf_study order by study_no desc
